concept.title: Personal Information and Privacy
concept.shortdesc: You can use your NC State Unity account to access your personal, academic and financial information, and it's very important that you keep this information safe.

section.p: To view or change your personal information in MyPack Portal:
MyPack Portal > Student Homepage > Personal Information tile
On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information, including

ul.li: Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name)
Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
